pr_title: TSK-1340: Classification now gets displayed correctly in Workplace

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason why you name the variable classificationSummary instead of classification although the type is only classification?
timeline.author: sofie29

replies.bodyText:
The response for a GET of a task returns an object, which has the property classificationSummary, which actually is just a classificationSummary, as i just checked.
Will update
replies.author: Tristan2357

timeline.message: TSK-1340: Classification now gets displayed correctly in Workplace
